summary: After rising bootlegger Slaughterhouse Scorpio eliminates his gangland competition, two reporters and a cabal of six businessmen work to expose him.
cast: Wallace Beery|Lewis Stone|Johnny Mack Brown|Jean Harlow|Marjorie Rambeau|Paul Hurst|Clark Gable|Ralph Bellamy|John Miljan|DeWitt Jennings|Murray Kinnell|Fletcher Norton|Louis Natheaux|Frank McGlynn Sr.|Theodore von Eltz|Lynton Brent|Mary Carlisle|Charles Giblyn|Joseph W. Girard|Betty Lawson|Tom London|George Magrill|Lee Phelps|Buddy Roosevelt|Oscar Rudolph|Hector V. Sarno|Carol Tevis|Arthur Thalasso|Walter Walker|S.D. Wilcox
keywords: shot in the arm|beer|chewing tobacco|diamond ring|cigar smoking
director: Director: George W. Hill (as George Hill)
title: Los seis misterios
